X3 Mult on final hand of round: The last time the battle played hand X3 Mult
X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four o: If the played hand card type contains Four of a Kind, then X4 Mult
You don't earn interest. Instead, gain $: No interest was obtained. But after the battle, every HP remaining +$2, every Discard remaining +$1
x2 Mult if played hand contains a Flush: If the played hand card type contains Flush, then X2 Mult
x2 Mult if played hand contains a Pair: If the played hand card type contains a pair, then X2 Mult
x3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced: If there are at least 16 enhancements in the deck, then x3 Mult (currently {} )
x4 Mult every 6 hands played 5 remaining: x4 Mult for every 6 cards ({} left)
+1 mult per $, Capped at +40, Costs all: Get +1 Mult for every 1 gold coin owned, up to +40 Mult, and lose all gold coins for sale
X3.8 mult if played hand is the same as: If the number of cards played is '2', '2' and 'A' in order (reordering is allowed first), then X4.869 Mult
When you select a battle, generate 1 Joker card (must have space)
Each Joker card with an even length is given to X1.5 Mult
If played hand name contains 'Flush' (ex: If the played hand card name contains 'Flush' (except Flush), the Flush card level is added to the level calculation
+4 Mult if played hand contains a High C: If the played hand card type is High Card, +6 Mult
Create 2 Negative Joker(s) when hand is: When the boss is defeated, add one random Negative Joker cards
Retrigger all Jokers to the left once fo: There is 1 rare Joker to the right of this Joker, and then retrieve all Jokers to the left (excluding the generated class Joker)
Earn 12% of total money at end of round,: At the end of the battle, you receive interest of 12% of the gold coins, +3% per consecutive battle, 80 coins at most (currently {}%)
This Joker gains +8 Chips for each card: For each card purchased, this Joker card +8 Chip (currently +{})
+22 Mult if played hand contains a Five: If played hand contains Five of a Kind , +22 Mult
Scaling Jokers scale quadratically: Growth Joker brand growth rate x2
This Joker gains X0.2 Mult for each play: For each unscore '{}' card, this Joker card receives X0.2 Mult, (the suit changes every time it fights, currently X{})
^3 Mult if played cards are scored 10 or: If the Mult is not greater than 10 when settled to the Joker card, Mult is at the power of 3
^4 Mult only after playing 114 hands (Cu: When 114 cards have been played, Mult is to power 4 (current {}/114)
Retrigger all cards played 1 time(s), ea: All scoreboards played triggered once more, each scoreboard x2 Mult
This Joker gains X0.15 Mult per consecut: Whenever the card with the most played hand is played continuously, this Joker card receives x0.15 Mult (currently x{})
This Joker gains X0.02 Mult when each pl: This Joker card receives x0.02 Mult (currently x{}) whenever all cards played are scored
This Joker gains X13 Mult when Jolly Jok: When the 'Glasses' Joker card is sold, this Joker card receives x13 Mult (currently x{})
Create a Negative Jolly Joker when Blind: When a fight is selected, generate a Negative 'glasses' Joker card
+22 Mult if played hand contains a Strai: If played hand contains Flush schema, you get +22 Mult (currently +{} Mult )
All face cards are considered Kings, all: All the top cards are considered 'king', and all digital cards are considered '10'
Increase payout by $1 for each Ace held: Each card with a '{}' in the hand, the bounty will be +1$ (the points will change in each battle)
+19 Mult if played hand contains a Four: If played hand contains Four of a Kind, Mult to the power of 1.5
If poker hand is a Royal Flush, destroy: If played hand is Royal Flush, destroy the 'Queen' and add a Negative Rare Joker
+16 Mult if played hand contains a Full: If played hand contains Full House, +16 Mult
This Joker gains X0.5 Mult if played han: If played hand contains '2' and '7' that are not colored by Flush, this Joker card gets x0.5 Mult (currently x{})
X3 Mult if scoring hand contains exactly: If the scoreboard played contains 3 '3s', x3 Mult
+30 Mult if played hand contains a Flush: If played hand contains Flush Full House, Mult to the power of 1.5
+1 planet Card at end: If it is in your hand at the end, +1 planet card

It is strongly recommended to upgrade to: It is strongly recommended to upgrade to iOS18 or above play widgets, otherwise please do not click too fast (which will cause jump to the APP)
Play PvE Once to Unlock Pvp: Unlock ranking mode after playing one game
Please finish the Tutorial in APP first: Please complete the tutorial in the APP first
win a run in privous stake: Win a game on the previous difficulty
Mr. Bones: The golden cicada takes off its shell
NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Used to recommend more interesting content to improve the experience
onboard_welcome emoji-card ;: Welcome to Joker Card! Let me introduce the game rules
onboard_levels boss ;: There are 8 major levels per game round. You can win by defeating the final boss.
onboard_monster elite boss ;: Each level has 2 elite monsters and 1 boss
onboard_elite elite fight $ detour b: Elite Monsters: Choose to fight, defeat and get gold coins to buy items, or take a detour to get a Buff
onboard_boss boss detour debuff ;: Boss can't be bypassed and will impose a Debuff on you (you may face a tough battle without purchasing items)
onboard_battle fight ;: The battle is starting. Let's choose the first battle.
onboard_enemyHP play ;: You use played hands to damage the enemy. You can play up to 5 cards each time
onboard_chipMult 'chips' 'mult' ;: Each hand type has its own Chips and Mult which multiply to create final damage
onboard_planets four of a kind full hous: Four of a Kind > Full House > Flush > Straight > Three of a Kind > Two Pair > One Pair > High Card. Try to play higher scoring hands! (Details can be viewed in Planet Levels)
onboard_playerHP play ;: After each played hand, the monster will deal 1 damage to you. If HP becomes 0, the game ends
onboard_playPair one pair play ;: Here is a pair. Select two 2s and click Play Hand (bottom right corner)
onboard_attack one pair 'chips' attack: The damage of a pair is 10 x 2. You may have noticed that the rank of played cards will also be added to Chips. Now continue to deal damage.
onboard_discard discard royal flush ;: No good hand type? You can select extra cards and then Discard (bottom left corner) to change hands. Now try discarding to get Royal Flush
onboard_playRoyalFlush royal flush ;: Lucky! We got what we needed ♠️ 10 to A Royal Flush and finish it!
Challenge mode is unlocked by winning a: Pass the normal difficulty of 5 standard cards to unlock the challenge deck
follow the tutorial to play a Royal Flus: Follow the tutorial to play a Royal Flush for now
follow the tutorial to play a Pair for n: Follow the tutorial to play a Pair for now
😎 There are no easter eggs here: 😎 There are no easter eggs here
follow the tutorial to discard ALL extra: Follow the tutorial to discard ALL extra cards
you'll crash the game!: You will let the game crash!
your local progress will be overwritten: Your local progress will be overwritten
Sorry about that, we'll work harder: Sorry about that, please join our QQ group to provide feedback
use {} Planet cards: From the Planet Card {}, select and use
use {} Tarot cards: From the tarot card {}, select and use
use {} Spectral cards: From the Spectral card {}, select and use
use {} SCP cards: From the Cthulhu card {}, select and use
The Kingdom of Emojis is under invasion: Symbol Kingdom is invaded by pixel monsters
Please defeat the monsters and rescue th: Please defeat the monsters and rescue the imprisoned symbols
You can choose to Fight or take a Det: You can choose to fight or detour (non-Boss)
Detour Gain a Buff Emoji (disappears a: Detour Get the Buff symbol (disappears after it takes effect), but cannot get gold coins and enter the store
Each level's boss will inflict a detrime: The boss of each level will impose a debuff that is not good for you
Monsters deal 1 point of damage to you e: Monsters deal 1 HP damage to you per turn
You deal damage to the monsters by playi: You damage the monsters through played hand
Each card type has corresponding basic C: Each card type has the corresponding Chip and Mult, and the two are multiplied to the final damage, for example in Lv.1:
Cards that match the hand type will prov: The card that forms the card type will provide the corresponding Chip (10, 'A' 11)
You can discard cards to collect highe: You can use Discard to get higher score cards and cards
Purchase various symbols to enhance your: More than just poker! Buy special cards to modify the rules of the game and enhance your deck
Joker card: Gain the corresponding effec: Joker card: As long as you hold it, you can get the corresponding effect
Tarot card: Take effect after use, consu: Tarot card: generates corresponding effects after use (consumables)
Planet card: Upgrade a card type after u: Planet Card: Upgrade the corresponding card type Level 1 (consumables)
Spectral card (rare): Take effect after: Spectral brand (rare): produces corresponding effects after use (consumables)
Wise choice, click 'Done' to finish: A wise choice, click 'Done' to end
can be any suit: Can be regarded as any color

report success, please join our group to: The feedback was successful, and I begged to join the group chat to help us solve the problem!
Jokers with the word \"Joker\" in their: Each Joker card with an even length is given to X1.5 Mult

Have $400 or more in a single game.
Go through no more than 12 battles to win one inning.
Destroy at least 2 glass cards in a played hand.
Played hand deals more than 10,000 damage at one time.
A single played hand deals more than 1,000,000 damage.
Score 100,000,000 Chips in a single hand: A single played hand deals more than 100,000,000 damage.
Thin your deck down to 20 or fewer cards: Shrink your deck to 20 or less.
You have 80 or more cards in your deck.
Win a game without refreshing the store.
Win with every deck at Gold Stake diffic: All decks pass the Golden Trophy difficulty
Get golden stickers on all Joker cards. (Performance with carriage)
Removes all modifications from all cards: Removes the enhancement effect of all hands in the deck. For each one removed, 4 gold coins will be given
Creates 2 copies of a random Joker, +1 A: Create 2 random Joker cards replicas, level +1
All of your Jokers become Negative, all: All your Joker cards become Negative, and the price of Joker cards in all stores doubles this run
Create 3 Negative copies of a random con: Create 3 Negative replicas of randomly consumed cards

Swap the editions of left most joker and: Swap the enhancement effect of the leftmost and rightmost Joker cards
Upgrade most played poker hand by 4, Rem: Upgrade the most commonly used cards (if there are multiple, random ones) by level 4, reset all other cards
Reduce hands to 1, Gain $4 for each hand: Clear the deck, only 1 hand is left, and 4 gold coins are obtained for each hand deleted
Next defeated Blind gives X3 interest: Receive 3 times the bounty next time you defeat the enemy
Fill all empty slots with random cards,: Fill all empty Slots and the gold coins become 0
Detour will still start a battle: After a detour has obtained a Buff, the battle will still be triggered
1 in 4 chance for +2 level of all poker: 1/4 chance to make all card types +2
Converts every card in your hand to a si: Turn all cards in your hand into random Flush colors and points, Hand Size -2

You can select 6 cards: You can play up to 6 cards
All of your Jokers become Eternal, add 1: All your Joker cards become eternal, adding 1 Joker Slot
discard card deal damage too: Discard will also cause basic damage to the enemy.

remove enhancement (except for negative): Remove 1 random Joker card enhancement (except Negative) and receive 20 gold coins
Halve all listed prices in current shop: All current store prices are cut in half
Add $5 when Blind defeated, joker slot -: Give 5 extra gold coins when defeating enemies, Joker Slot -1

Open game through invitation link: Open the game through the invitation link

This Joker gains +31 Chips if played han: This Joker gains +31 Chips if played hand contains a Hearts or Diamonds Flush (Currently +{} Chips)
Played cards with even rank give +20 Chi: When the card points played are {}, give +20 Chip and +2 Mult, and the parity changes at the end of the battle
Earn a random payout at end of round ($5: At the end of the battle, get a random reward ($5/$15/$50)
After 2 rounds, sell this card to add Ne: After 2 battles, sell this card to add Negative to a random Joker card (currently {}/2)
For every 5% of required score exceeded,: After the battle, you will get 1 gold coin (up to 40 gold coins) for every 5% of the enemy's total HP.
Give X0.5 Chips for every ¥5 less than ¥: The gold coins held, 5 gold coins less than 20 gold coins, Chip x0.5
All cards in your deck transform into an: Enhance all hands in your deck, destroy all Joker cards, Joker Slot -1
Endless mode scores are not counted in l: The scores of the endless mode are not included in the ranking list

This game doesn't use any game engine, s: This game does not use any game engine, so it loads faster
